answers.answer: Clearly you aren't going to get an answer in an ER. After five trips I would think that you would have been seen by a gastroenterologist. This would certainly be appropriate to evaluate your issue.

question: i've been vomitting green and having green bowel movements with left upper quadrant pain.  I wake up feeling nauseated and start vomitting and can;t stop without medication, please help been to er 5 times they don't know what's wrong said it could be diabetes related and i have a fatty liver and my galbladder has been removed.
title: sick for 2 months
